availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John R. Burton (Granville County, North Carolina, and Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Margaret "Peggy" Burton. Father of John Burton, Jesse Burton, Paul Burton, Missouri A. Burton, Sabrina Burton, Martha Burton, Richard Burton, and Louisa Burton. Farmer in Napp, North Carolina, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, North Carolina, Granville County, Napp, p. 171B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 649.
"John Richard Burton (1825-1903)," Find A Grave, Memorial #54670610, accessed January 18 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/54670610.
